markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 322 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Bloodlines**
[Elemental](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=6), [Phoenix](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=15)

**Deities**
[Angradd](/Deities.aspx?ID=84), [Chohar](/Deities.aspx?ID=215), [Lady Nanbyo](/Deities.aspx?ID=179), [Moloch](/Deities.aspx?ID=70), [Nurgal](/Deities.aspx?ID=78), [Ra](/Deities.aspx?ID=57), [Rovagug](/Deities.aspx?ID=15), [Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=16), [Szuriel](/Deities.aspx?ID=136), [Walkena](/Deities.aspx?ID=159), [Walkena](/Deities.aspx?ID=159), [Ymeri](/Deities.aspx?ID=108)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 15-foot cone

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

Gouts of flame rush from your hands. You deal 2d6 fire damage to creatures in the area.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Burning Hands

summary: A small cone of flame rushes from your hands.
summary_markdown: A small cone of flame rushes from your hands.
text: Burning Hands Source Core Rulebook pg. 322 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Bloodlines Elemental, Phoenix Deities Angradd, Chohar, Lady Nanbyo, Moloch, Nurgal, Ra, Rovagug, Sarenrae, Szuriel, Walkena, Walkena, Ymeri Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Area 15-foot cone Saving Throw basic Reflex --- Gouts of flame rush from your hands. You deal 2d6 fire damage to creatures in the area. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.
